org.apache.flink.api.java.record.io.jdbc

Class JDBCInputFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.io.GenericInputFormat<Record>
      • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.io.GenericInputFormat
        • org.apache.flink.api.java.record.io.jdbc.JDBCInputFormat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, InputFormat<Record,GenericInputSplit>, NonParallelInput

    public class JDBCInputFormat
extends GenericInputFormat
implements NonParallelInput
    InputFormat to read data from a database and generate PactReords. The InputFormat has to be configured with the query, and either all connection parameters or a complete database URL.Configuration The position of a value inside a Record is determined by the table returned.
    See Also:
    Configuration, Record, DriverManager, Serialized Form

      • JDBCInputFormat

        public JDBCInputFormat()
        Creates a non-configured JDBCInputFormat. This format has to be configured using configure(configuration).

        driverName - JDBC-Drivename
        dbURL - Formatted URL containing all connection parameters.

        password -
        query - Query to execute.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        public void configure(Configuration parameters)
        Configures this JDBCInputFormat. This includes setting the connection parameters (if necessary), establishing the connection and executing the query.
        Specified by:
        configure in interface InputFormat<Record,GenericInputSplit>
        Overrides:
        configure in class GenericInputFormat<Record>
        Parameters:
        parameters - Configuration containing all or no parameters.
